TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Conversion extends System.Object

summary.span: 模块包含用于执行各种转换操作的过程。

span.span: The module contains the procedures used to perform various conversion operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模块支持的 Visual Basic 语言关键字和运行时库成员将十进制数字转换为其他基数的数字与字符串、 字符串转换为数字和一个数据类型到另一个。This module supports the Visual Basic language keywords and run-time library members that convert decimal numbers to other bases, numbers to strings, strings to numbers, and one data type to another. ## Examples 此示例使用`Hex`函数返回一个数字的十六进制值。This example uses the `Hex` function to return the hexadecimal value of a number. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#16)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static object CTypeDynamic (object Expression, Type TargetType);
.method public static object CTypeDynamic(object Expression, class System.Type TargetType) cil managed
Public Function CTypeDynamic (Expression As Object, TargetType As Type) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ CTypeDynamic(System::Object ^ Expression, Type ^ TargetType);
static member CTypeDynamic : obj * Type -> obj

param.name: Expression
param.span: 要转换的对象。

span.span: The object to convert.

param.name: TargetType
param.span: 该对象要转换为的类型。

span.span: The type to which to convert the object.

summary.span: 将对象转换为指定类型。

span.span: Converts an object to the specified type.

returns.span: 一个对象，其类型在运行时为请求的目标类型。

span.span: An object whose type at run time is the requested target type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CTypeDynamic`方法将转换为传递的对象`Expression`参数指定的类型`TargetType`参数。The `CTypeDynamic` method converts the object passed as the `Expression` parameter to the type specified by the `TargetType` parameter. 如果对象是一个动态对象，`CTypeDynamic`方法应用可用的动态转换。If the object is a dynamic object, the `CTypeDynamic` method applies available dynamic conversions. `CTypeDynamic`方法适用于动态转换根据对象本身定义的转换语义。The `CTypeDynamic` method applies dynamic conversions in accordance with the conversion semantics defined by the object itself. 如果动态对象继承自，则`CTypeDynamic`方法首先尝试使用用户定义的静态转换执行转换。If a dynamic object inherits from , the `CTypeDynamic` method first attempts to perform the conversion by using a user-defined, static conversion. 如果用户定义的静态转换失败，`CTypeDynamic`方法尝试通过使用动态转换执行转换。If the user-defined, static conversion fails, the `CTypeDynamic` method attempts to perform the conversion by using dynamic conversions. 如果动态对象实现，则`CTypeDynamic`方法使优先级动态转换到能够对用户定义的静态转换。If a dynamic object implements , the `CTypeDynamic` method gives precedence to dynamic conversions over user-defined, static conversions. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`CTypeDynamic`方法以使用动态对象所定义的转换将动态对象转换为字符串。The following example uses the `CTypeDynamic` method to convert a dynamic object to a string by using the conversion defined by the dynamic object. ```vb Imports System.Dynamic Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim dyn As Object = New SampleDynamicObject Dim sampleString = CTypeDynamic(dyn, GetType(String)) Console.WriteLine(sampleString) End Sub End Module Class SampleDynamicObject Inherits DynamicObject Public Overrides Function TryConvert(ByVal binder As ConvertBinder, ByRef result As Object) As Boolean If binder.Type = GetType(String) Then result = "Sample String" Return True End If Return False End Function End Class ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CTypeDynamic`方法将作为传递的对象转换`Expression`参数指定的泛型参数类型的类型。The `CTypeDynamic` method converts the object passed as the `Expression` parameter to the type specified by the type of the generic parameter. 如果对象是一个动态对象，`CTypeDynamic`方法应用可用的动态转换。If the object is a dynamic object, the `CTypeDynamic` method applies available dynamic conversions. `CTypeDynamic`方法适用于动态转换根据对象本身定义的转换语义。The `CTypeDynamic` method applies dynamic conversions in accordance with the conversion semantics defined by the object itself. 如果动态对象继承自，则`CTypeDynamic`方法首先尝试使用用户定义的静态转换执行转换。If a dynamic object inherits from , the `CTypeDynamic` method first attempts to perform the conversion by using a user-defined, static conversion. 如果用户定义的静态转换失败，`CTypeDynamic`方法尝试通过使用动态转换执行转换。If the user-defined, static conversion fails, the `CTypeDynamic` method attempts to perform the conversion by using dynamic conversions. 如果动态对象实现，则`CTypeDynamic`方法使优先级动态转换到能够对用户定义的静态转换。If a dynamic object implements , the `CTypeDynamic` method gives precedence to dynamic conversions over user-defined, static conversions. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`CTypeDynamic`方法以使用动态对象所定义的转换将动态对象转换为字符串。The following example uses the `CTypeDynamic` method to convert a dynamic object to a string by using the conversion defined by the dynamic object. ```vb Imports System.Dynamic Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim dyn As Object = New SampleDynamicObject Dim str = CTypeDynamic(Of String)(dyn) Console.WriteLine(str) End Sub End Module Class SampleDynamicObject Inherits DynamicObject Public Overrides Function TryConvert(ByVal binder As ConvertBinder, ByRef result As Object) As Boolean If binder.Type = GetType(String) Then result = "Sample String" Return True End If Return False End Function End Class ```

summary.span: 返回与给定的错误号对应的错误信息。

span.span: Returns the error message that corresponds to a given error number.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static string ErrorToString() cil managed

summary.span: 返回与给定的错误号对应的错误信息。

span.span: Returns the error message that corresponds to a given error number.

returns.span: 对应于最新运行时错误的错误消息。

span.span: The error message that corresponds to the most recent run-time error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ErrorToString`函数将检查的属性设置`Err`对象来标识最新的运行时错误。The `ErrorToString` function examines the property settings of the `Err` object to identify the most recent run-time error. 返回值`ErrorToString`函数对应于`Description`属性的`Err`对象。The return value of the `ErrorToString` function corresponds to the `Description` property of the `Err` object. 如果没有运行时错误，`ErrorToString`返回一个零长度字符串 ("")。If no run-time error has occurred, `ErrorToString` returns a zero-length string (""). 提供此功能已在 Visual Basic 6.0 及更早版本中，`Error`函数。In Visual Basic version 6.0 and earlier, this functionality was provided by the `Error` function. ## Examples 下面的代码使用`ErrorToString`函数以显示与指定的错误号相对应的错误消息。The following code uses the `ErrorToString` function to display error messages that correspond to the specified error numbers. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#4)]

span.span: is out of range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ErrorToString`函数将检查的属性设置`Err`对象来标识最新的运行时错误。The `ErrorToString` function examines the property settings of the `Err` object to identify the most recent run-time error. 返回值`ErrorToString`函数对应于`Description`属性的`Err`对象。The return value of the `ErrorToString` function corresponds to the `Description` property of the `Err` object. 如果`ErrorNumber`是有效的错误号，但未定义，则`ErrorToString`返回的字符串`"Application-defined or object-defined error."`如果`ErrorNumber`无效，出现错误。If `ErrorNumber` is a valid error number but is not defined, `ErrorToString` returns the string `"Application-defined or object-defined error."` If `ErrorNumber` is not valid, an error occurs. 如果`ErrorNumber`省略，则对应于最新的消息返回运行时错误。If `ErrorNumber` is omitted, the message corresponding to the most recent run-time error is returned. 如果没有运行时错误或`ErrorNumber`为 0，`ErrorToString`返回一个零长度字符串 ("")。If no run-time error has occurred or `ErrorNumber` is 0, `ErrorToString` returns a zero-length string (""). 提供此功能已在 Visual Basic 6.0 及更早版本中，`Error`函数。In Visual Basic version 6.0 and earlier, this functionality was provided by the `Error` function. ## Examples 下面的代码使用`ErrorToString`函数以显示与指定的错误号相对应的错误消息。The following code uses the `ErrorToString` function to display error messages that correspond to the specified error numbers. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#4)]

summary.span: 返回数字的整数部分。

span.span: Return the integer portion of a number.

returns.span: 返回数字的整数部分。

span.span: Return the integer portion of a number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 同时`Int`并`Fix`函数删除的小数部分的`Number`并返回结果的整数值。Both the `Int` and `Fix` functions remove the fractional part of `Number` and return the resulting integer value. 之间的差异`Int`并`Fix`功能时，如果`Number`为负，`Int`返回小于或等于第一个负整数`Number`，而`Fix`返回第一个负整数大于或等于`Number`。The difference between `Int` and `Fix` functions is that if `Number` is negative, `Int` returns the first negative integer less than or equal to `Number`, whereas `Fix` returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to `Number`. 例如，`Int`转换为-9，-8.4 和`Fix`将-8.4 转换成-8。For example, `Int` converts -8.4 to -9, and `Fix` converts -8.4 to -8. `Fix(number)` 等效于 `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).``Fix(number)` is equivalent to `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).` ## Examples 此示例演示了如何`Int`和`Fix`函数返回数字的整数部分。This example illustrates how the `Int` and `Fix` functions return integer portions of numbers. 如果参数为负号，`Int`函数返回第一个负整数小于或等于编号;`Fix`函数返回第一个负整数大于或等于数。In the case of a negative number argument, the `Int` function returns the first negative integer less than or equal to the number; the `Fix` function returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to the number. 下面的示例要求您指定`Option Strict Off`因为类型隐式转换从`Double`键入`Integer`不允许基于`Option Strict On`:The following example requires you to specify `Option Strict Off` because implicit conversions from type `Double` to type `Integer` are not allowed under `Option Strict On`: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class2.vb#4)] 可以使用`CInt`函数以将其他数据类型显式转换为类型`Integer`与`Option Strict Off`。You can use the `CInt` function to explicitly convert other data types to type `Integer` with `Option Strict Off`. 但是，`CInt`舍入为最接近的整数，而不是截断的数字的小数部分。However, `CInt` rounds to the nearest integer instead of truncating the fractional part of numbers. 例如：For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#5)] 可以使用`CInt`函数的调用结果`Fix`或`Int`执行而不进行舍入为整数的显式转换。You can use the `CInt` function on the result of a call to `Fix` or `Int` to perform explicit conversion to integer without rounding. 例如：For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 有关详细信息`CInt`，请参阅[类型转换函数](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions.md)。For more information on `CInt`, see [Type Conversion Functions](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 同时`Int`并`Fix`函数删除的小数部分的`Number`并返回结果的整数值。Both the `Int` and `Fix` functions remove the fractional part of `Number` and return the resulting integer value. 之间的差异`Int`并`Fix`功能时，如果`Number`为负，`Int`返回小于或等于第一个负整数`Number`，而`Fix`返回第一个负整数大于或等于`Number`。The difference between `Int` and `Fix` functions is that if `Number` is negative, `Int` returns the first negative integer less than or equal to `Number`, whereas `Fix` returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to `Number`. 例如，`Int`转换为-9，-8.4 和`Fix`将-8.4 转换成-8。For example, `Int` converts -8.4 to -9, and `Fix` converts -8.4 to -8. `Fix(number)` 等效于 `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).``Fix(number)` is equivalent to `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).` ## Examples 此示例演示了如何`Int`和`Fix`函数返回数字的整数部分。This example illustrates how the `Int` and `Fix` functions return integer portions of numbers. 如果参数为负号，`Int`函数返回第一个负整数小于或等于编号;`Fix`函数返回第一个负整数大于或等于数。In the case of a negative number argument, the `Int` function returns the first negative integer less than or equal to the number; the `Fix` function returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to the number. 下面的示例要求您指定`Option Strict Off`因为类型隐式转换从`Double`键入`Integer`不允许基于`Option Strict On`:The following example requires you to specify `Option Strict Off` because implicit conversions from type `Double` to type `Integer` are not allowed under `Option Strict On`: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class2.vb#4)] 可以使用`CInt`函数以将其他数据类型显式转换为类型`Integer`与`Option Strict Off`。You can use the `CInt` function to explicitly convert other data types to type `Integer` with `Option Strict Off`. 但是，`CInt`舍入为最接近的整数，而不是截断的数字的小数部分。However, `CInt` rounds to the nearest integer instead of truncating the fractional part of numbers. 例如：For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#5)] 可以使用`CInt`函数的调用结果`Fix`或`Int`执行而不进行舍入为整数的显式转换。You can use the `CInt` function on the result of a call to `Fix` or `Int` to perform explicit conversion to integer without rounding. 例如：For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 有关详细信息`CInt`，请参阅[类型转换函数](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions.md)。For more information on `CInt`, see [Type Conversion Functions](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`Number`已不是整数，它正在计算之前四舍五入为最接近的整数。If `Number` is not already a whole number, it is rounded to the nearest whole number before being evaluated. |如果`Number`是If `Number` is|则 hex 返回Hex returns| |-|-| |空Empty|零 (0)Zero (0)| |任何数值Any numeric value|最多 16 个十六进制字符Up to sixteen hexadecimal characters| 您可以直接通过在适当范围的数字之前表示十六进制数字`&H`。You can represent hexadecimal numbers directly by preceding numbers in the proper range with `&H`. 例如，`&H10`表示十六进制表示法中的十进制数 16。For example, `&H10` represents decimal 16 in hexadecimal notation. ## Examples 此示例使用`Hex`函数返回一个数字的十六进制值。This example uses the `Hex` function to return the hexadecimal value of a number. span.span: Returns a string representing the hexadecimal value of a number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`Number`已不是整数，它正在计算之前四舍五入为最接近的整数。If `Number` is not already a whole number, it is rounded to the nearest whole number before being evaluated. |如果`Number`是If `Number` is|则 hex 返回Hex returns| |-|-| |空Empty|零 (0)Zero (0)| |任何数值Any numeric value|最多 16 个十六进制字符Up to sixteen hexadecimal characters| 您可以直接通过在适当范围的数字之前表示十六进制数字`&H`。You can represent hexadecimal numbers directly by preceding numbers in the proper range with `&H`. 例如，`&H10`表示十六进制表示法中的十进制数 16。For example, `&H10` represents decimal 16 in hexadecimal notation. ## Examples 此示例使用`Hex`函数返回一个数字的十六进制值。This example uses the `Hex` function to return the hexadecimal value of a number. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#16)]

span.span: Return the integer portion of a number.

returns.span: 返回数字的整数部分。

span.span: Return the integer portion of a number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 同时`Int`并`Fix`函数删除的小数部分的`Number`并返回结果的整数值。Both the `Int` and `Fix` functions remove the fractional part of `Number` and return the resulting integer value. 之间的差异`Int`并`Fix`功能时，如果`Number`为负，`Int`返回小于或等于第一个负整数`Number`，而`Fix`返回第一个负整数大于或等于`Number`。The difference between `Int` and `Fix` functions is that if `Number` is negative, `Int` returns the first negative integer less than or equal to `Number`, whereas `Fix` returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to `Number`. 例如，`Int`转换为-9，-8.4 和`Fix`将-8.4 转换成-8。For example, `Int` converts -8.4 to -9, and `Fix` converts -8.4 to -8. `Fix(number)` 等效于 `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).``Fix(number)` is equivalent to `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).` ## Examples 此示例演示了如何`Int`和`Fix`函数返回数字的整数部分。This example illustrates how the `Int` and `Fix` functions return integer portions of numbers. 如果参数为负号，`Int`函数返回第一个负整数小于或等于编号;`Fix`函数返回第一个负整数大于或等于数。In the case of a negative number argument, the `Int` function returns the first negative integer less than or equal to the number; the `Fix` function returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to the number. 下面的示例要求您指定`Option Strict Off`因为类型隐式转换从`Double`键入`Integer`不允许基于`Option Strict On`:The following example requires you to specify `Option Strict Off` because implicit conversions from type `Double` to type `Integer` are not allowed under `Option Strict On`: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class2.vb#4)] 可以使用`CInt`函数以将其他数据类型显式转换为类型`Integer`与`Option Strict Off`。You can use the `CInt` function to explicitly convert other data types to type `Integer` with `Option Strict Off`. 但是，`CInt`舍入为最接近的整数，而不是截断的数字的小数部分。However, `CInt` rounds to the nearest integer instead of truncating the fractional part of numbers. 例如：For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#5)] 可以使用`CInt`函数的调用结果`Fix`或`Int`执行而不进行舍入为整数的显式转换。You can use the `CInt` function on the result of a call to `Fix` or `Int` to perform explicit conversion to integer without rounding. 例如：For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 有关详细信息`CInt`，请参阅[类型转换函数](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions.md)。For more information on `CInt`, see [Type Conversion Functions](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions.md).

the `Fix` function returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to the number. 下面的示例要求您指定`Option Strict Off`因为类型隐式转换从`Double`键入`Integer`不允许基于`Option Strict On`:The following example requires you to specify `Option Strict Off` because implicit conversions from type `Double` to type `Integer` are not allowed under `Option Strict On`: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class2.vb#4)] 可以使用`CInt`函数以将其他数据类型显式转换为类型`Integer`与`Option Strict Off`。You can use the `CInt` function to explicitly convert other data types to type `Integer` with `Option Strict Off`. 但是，`CInt`舍入为最接近的整数，而不是截断的数字的小数部分。However, `CInt` rounds to the nearest integer instead of truncating the fractional part of numbers. 例如：For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#5)] 可以使用`CInt`函数的调用结果`Fix`或`Int`执行而不进行舍入为整数的显式转换。You can use the `CInt` function on the result of a call to `Fix` or `Int` to perform explicit conversion to integer without rounding. 例如：For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 有关详细信息`CInt`，请参阅[类型转换函数](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions.md)。For more information on `CInt`, see [Type Conversion Functions](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`Number`已不是整数，它正在计算之前四舍五入为最接近的整数。If `Number` is not already a whole number, it is rounded to the nearest whole number before being evaluated. |如果数字为If Number is|Oct 返回Oct returns| |-|-| |空Empty|零 (0)Zero (0)| |其他任何数字Any other number|最多为 22 个八进制字符Up to 22 octal characters| 您可以直接通过在适当范围的数字之前表示八进制数字`&O`。You can represent octal numbers directly by preceding numbers in the proper range with `&O`. 例如，`&O10`是十进制数 8 的八进制表示法。For example, `&O10` is the octal notation for decimal 8. ## Examples 此示例使用`Oct`函数返回一个数字的八进制值。This example uses the `Oct` function to return the octal value of a number. MemberSignature.Value: .method public static string Str(object Number) cil managed
Public Function Str (Number As Object) As String

param.name: Number
param.span: 必需。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 包含任何有效的数值表达式的 。

span.span: An containing any valid numeric expression.

summary.span: 返回数字的 表示形式。

span.span: Returns a representation of a number.

returns.span: 返回数字的 表示形式。

span.span: Returns a representation of a number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将数字转换为字符串时, 的符号始终保留一个前导空格`Number`。When numbers are converted to strings, a leading space is always reserved for the sign of `Number`. 如果`Number`为正，则返回的字符串包含前导空格和符号为正。If `Number` is positive, the returned string contains a leading space, and the plus sign is implied. 减号 （-） 和没有前导空格，将包括一个负数。A negative number will include the minus sign (-) and no leading space. 使用`Format`函数将转换为日期、 时间、 货币或以其他用户定义的格式，您需要格式化的数字值。Use the `Format` function to convert numeric values you want formatted as dates, times, or currency or in other user-defined formats. 与不同`Str`函数，`Format`函数不包括前导空格的表示符号`Number`。Unlike the `Str` function, the `Format` function does not include a leading space for the sign of `Number`. > [!NOTE] > `Str`函数可以识别只将句点 (`.`) 作为有效的小数分隔符。The `Str` function recognizes only the period (`.`) as a valid decimal separator. 如果使用不同的小数点分隔符 （例如，在国际应用程序），使用`CStr`或`Format`函数将数字转换为字符串。If different decimal separators are used (for example, in international applications), use the `CStr` or `Format` functions to convert a number to a string. 若要获取特定区域性中的数字的字符串表示形式，请使用数字的`ToString(IFormatProvider)`方法。To get the string representation of a number in a particular culture, use the number's `ToString(IFormatProvider)` method. 例如，使用类型的值转换时`Double`为字符串。For example, use when converting a value of type `Double` to a string. ## Examples 此示例使用`Str`函数返回`String`的数字表示形式。This example uses the `Str` function to return a `String` representation of a number. 时的正数值转换为字符串，为其符号始终保留一个前导空格。When a positive number is converted to a string, a leading space is always reserved for its sign. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#1)]

is not a numeric type.

span.span: Returns the numbers contained in a string as a numeric value of appropriate type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Val`函数停止读取处不能将其识别为数字一部分的第一个字符的字符串。The `Val` function stops reading the string at the first character it cannot recognize as part of a number. 无法识别符号和通常被认为是数值，如美元符号和逗号，一部分的字符。Symbols and characters that are often considered parts of numeric values, such as dollar signs and commas, are not recognized. 但是，该函数可以识别基数前缀`&O`(为八进制) 和`&H`（对于十六进制格式）。However, the function recognizes the radix prefixes `&O` (for octal) and `&H` (for hexadecimal). 从参数中去除空格、 制表符和换行字符。Blanks, tabs, and linefeed characters are stripped from the argument. 以下调用返回值 1615198。The following call returns the value 1615198. ``` Val(" 1615 198th Street N.E.") ``` 以下调用返回的十进制值为-1。The following call returns the decimal value -1. ``` Val("&HFFFF") ``` > [!NOTE] > `Val`函数可以识别只将句点 (`.`) 作为有效的小数分隔符。The `Val` function recognizes only the period (`.`) as a valid decimal separator. 当使用不同的小数点分隔符时，国际应用程序，如使用`CDbl`或`CInt`改为将字符串转换为数字。When different decimal separators are used, as in international applications, use `CDbl` or `CInt` instead to convert a string to a number. 若要将特定区域性的数字的字符串表示形式转换为数字值，请使用数值类型的`Parse(String, IFormatProvider)`方法。To convert the string representation of a number in a particular culture to a numeric value, use the numeric type's `Parse(String, IFormatProvider)` method. 例如，使用转换为字符串时`Double`。For example, use when converting a string to a `Double`. > [!NOTE] > 可能在某些不常见的数字格式的响应中引发异常。An exception might be raised in response to certain uncommon number formats. 例如，下面的代码引发此异常。For example, the following code raises this exception. > > `' These examples cause run-time errors.` > > `'Console.WriteLine(Val("1.34%"))` > > `'Console.WriteLine(Val("1.34&"))` > > 格式为数之间的冲突`Double`和`Integer`和`Long`编译器会发现类型字符，如果它未包含在一个字符串。The conflict between the number formatted as a `Double` and the `Integer` and `Long` type characters would be caught by the compiler if it were not contained in a string. > > `' These examples cause compiler errors.` > > `'Dim m = 1.34%` > > `'Dim n = 1.34&` ## Examples 下面的示例使用`Val`函数以返回每个字符串中包含的数字。The following example uses the `Val` function to return the numbers contained in each string. `Val` 在不能解释为数字、 数值修饰符、 数值标点或空白的第一个字符停止转换。`Val` stops converting at the first character that cannot be interpreted as a numeric digit, numeric modifier, numeric punctuation, or white space. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#54](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#54)]
